name: Fresh Bananas
description: Fresh, ripe bananas perfect for snacking or smoothies. Rich in potassium and natural sugars.

name: Organic Milk
description: Pure organic whole milk from grass-fed cows. Rich in calcium and vitamins.

name: Whole Wheat Bread
description: Freshly baked whole wheat bread with no preservatives. Perfect for sandwiches and toast.

name: Red Tomatoes
description: Juicy, vine-ripened tomatoes perfect for salads, cooking, and sandwiches.

name: Free Range Eggs
description: Farm-fresh free-range eggs from happy hens. High in protein and essential nutrients.

name: Green Apples
description: Crisp and tart Granny Smith apples. Perfect for baking, snacking, or making apple sauce.

name: Greek Yogurt
description: Thick and creamy Greek yogurt packed with probiotics and protein. Available in plain flavor.

name: Carrots
description: Fresh, crunchy carrots perfect for snacking, cooking, or juicing. Rich in beta-carotene.

name: Croissants
description: Buttery, flaky croissants baked fresh daily. Perfect for breakfast or a light snack.

name: Orange Juice
description: Fresh-squeezed orange juice with no added sugars. Packed with vitamin C and natural flavors.

name: Chicken Breast
description: Fresh, boneless chicken breast perfect for grilling, baking, or stir-frying. High in protein.

name: Strawberries
description: Sweet and juicy strawberries perfect for desserts, smoothies, or eating fresh.
